## Academic Use

This website is maintained as part of academic research at the Hoover Institution, Stanford University. The content is provided for informational and educational purposes.

## Research Content

The research notes, analyses, and code reviews presented on this site represent work in progress. Findings and methodologies may be updated as research continues.

## External Resources

Links to external resources (Google Drive, Google Docs, GitHub repositories) are provided for collaborators and interested researchers. Access to some resources may be restricted.

## Intellectual Property

All original content on this site, unless otherwise noted, is the intellectual property of the research team. Code repositories may have their own licensing terms specified in their respective repositories.

## No Warranties

The content is provided "as is" without warranty of any kind, express or implied. We make no guarantees about the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of the information presented.

## Changes to Terms

We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.
